findings.expected: Configuration should remain stable and coordinated across contributors.
findings.observed: 36 recent commits touched config/infra files in lookback window.
findings.remediation: Consolidate config ownership, batch related changes, and document rationale in PRs.
findings.title: Recent config churn detected

findings.expected: A single dominant testing style should be applied within a module area.
findings.remediation: Define module-level test style guidance (snapshot vs mocks vs integration) and align suites.
findings.title: Test philosophy drift

suggested_actions.patch_approach: Apply deterministic fixes first (formatter/lint/rule-based edits), then targeted manual refactors.
suggested_actions.title: Recent config churn detected
suggested_actions.what_to_change: Consolidate config ownership, batch related changes, and document rationale in PRs.
